name: Sniper Spirit 3D - Long Range Shooting
description:
Sniper Game 3D

Have fun shooting at targets at all distances.

You will have to take alls the weather parameters to calculate the good shoot :
- Distance
- Wind
- Temperature
- Atmospheric pressure

Different Maps are available:
- Desert
- Valley
- Mountain

The spotter mode helps you to do the shooting calculations and the Sniper mode is made to shoot.

This game allows you to get into the skin of a Sniper.

Enjoy, and Keep the Sniper Spirit ...
